text: Elizabeth Allen (January 25, 1929 â€“ September 19, 2006) was an American actress. She played Magda in the stage play The Gay Life. She also played Evelyn Randall in The Carey Treatment. Elizabeth Allen was born Jersey City, New Jersey. She died from kidney disease in Fishkill, New York. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:Deaths from kidney disease Category:1929 births Category:2006 deaths
